response.overview: In this series Peppa and her family have exciting adventures including parachuting out of airplanes, riding a hovercraft and getting stuck in the softplay centre. They visit with many good friends we have met before. They fly to Australia to visit with the Kangaroo family. They drop in on Buckingham Palace to see their friend the Queen who they have great fun jumping in muddy puddles with. We meet new friends like the Mole family, the Giraffe family and the keepers at the Zoo. Peppa goes to Madame Gazelle’s playschool where, along with friends like Emily Elephant, Pedro Pony and Danny Dog, she likes to play games and sing songs, especially the “Bing Bong Song”. Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles and her adventures always end happily with loud snorts of laughter.
response.title: Peppa Pig: Peppa And Friends
